price: 25. They say: "When will this promise (i.e. the Day of Resurrection) come to pass if you are telling the truth.?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
